Html:
Hi,

I am creating an Application in which i want to display the maps at various Zoom Levels

for that purpose i have created Bitmap images at various Zoom Levels .For eg at Level 0 there is one tile(image) completely representing the World at Level 1 4 Tiles are there and at level 2 16 tiles are

there ,now the problem is how to display them and in which Control, if i use PictureBox of a Fixed Size and if images are larger than this size then how will i display so how can i use GMap control for this purpose if yes then please suggest some basics for implementing this.
use the control, if you have some unique tiles create custom provider

Thanks RadioMan,

Could you please also suggest some keys for the same task..
